testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDMSMessageInventoryUpdate dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.4.9 [Need to Share DMS Message Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether DMS Message Number Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.5.7.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N45R614_DMS_Message_Number_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N45R614_DMS_Message_Number_Identifier_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether DMS Memory Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.5.7.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N45R615_DMS_Memory_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N45R615_DMS_Memory_Type_Supported}
Step 4 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 16 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDMSMessageInventorySubscription AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 17 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.1 IF TMDD_N45R614_DMS_Message_Number_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.1.1 VERIFY that element message-number exists within dMSMessageInventoryRequestMsg
Step 17.2 IF TMDD_N45R615_DMS_Memory_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.2.1 VERIFY that element message-memory-type exists within dMSMessageInventoryRequestMsg
Step 17.3 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 17.4 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 17.5 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDMSMessageInventorySubscription OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage
Step 17.6 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.6.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDMSMessageInventoryUpdate PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
